tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_2: Need a heater to provide heat
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_3: You still add some fuel to start the smeltery
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_4: Or you can use fuel tank
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_5: Also, don't forget to add fuel like lava
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.header: Use the Blaze Burner to heat
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_1: This is also a correct structure
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_2: Provide 400째C temperature and half the rate when extinguished
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_3: Provide 800째C temperature and normal rate when kindled
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_4: Provide 1600째C temperature and double the rate when seething
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_pipe.text_1: Besides the Faucets, you can also use the Pipe for casting
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_pipe.text_2: The pipe will transport the fluid to the casting container
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_spout.text_1: The table is actually a fluid container
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_spout.text_2: So spout can be used to cast
tgears.ponder.smeltery.text_2: It is necessary to form a space with only an upper opening
tgears.ponder.smeltery.text_3: Right-click the controller to open the GUI and work
tgears.ponder.smeltery_mini.text_1: It may not be economical, but it is interesting
tgears.ponder.smeltery_transfer.text_1: The chute can transport items to the smeltery
tgears.ponder.table_cooling.text_2: The fan must stick to the container
tgears.ponder.table_cooling.text_3: Acceleration is related to rotational speed of the fan
tgears.ponder.tag.smeltery.description: Tinker's components used to smelting and casting
